name: Barrette, Hair clip, Heart Barrette, Mint Green, Spring Hair Fashion,
description:
New for Spring! Womans Hair barrette, made from marbled polymer clay that has been "kissed" with variegated gold leaf. Handset glass stones and shell outlined in gold leaf

This Barrette is a beautiful minty green with ripples of ivory, turquoise and shades of green running through it.

This Clip measures about 4" long by 3" wide

This is a large size french barrette back that will hold most ponytails.

I create each piece and no two pieces will ever be the same. They are unique, and people will always ask where you found it, because they are not massed produced. These barrettes are sure to make a fashion statement and turn heads.

These hair accessories are the perfect gift for the hard to buy for girly girl, they come gift wrapped in tissue and a mesh bag for safe keeping. 

Please convo me if you like the item but would prefer a different color.

name: Pick 2 Headbands, Bow Headbands Pick 2 for 30 and Save...
description:
New for Spring, Bow Headbands crochet from 100% Cotton and available in all the yummy ice cream colors...

It is about 1" wide, with a bow that is 2.5" wide at the tips. These bands are great for the gym, hot summer weather, bad hair days, and times when you just need something a little girly and pretty. They are 100% natural cotton that is cooling and absorbent. These would even be great for a day at the beach when you want to put your hair up.

These bands come in 3 sizes, if you need a different size just convo me, and I will adjust it to your needs.

Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry.

I created this headband as a fashionable alternative to a typical headband, it is easy to wear, lightweight, absorbent and flattering to everyone.

If you love this style but prefer it in a different color or fiber, just convo me and I will be happy to work one up for you.

Pick the 2 colors that you would like to order, and the sizes that you need

Colors are subject to monitor differences

name: Boho, Bohemian, Gypsy, Headband, Hairwrap, Hippie, women, girls, Yoga Wrap, dread wrap
description:
Headband, Hairwrap, Yoga Wrap, Great for Workouts, This can be worn as a Headband or a dread wrap, crochet from 100% Cotton that is wonderfully absorbent and great in the hot weather or during a workout.

This Hairwrap can be made in virtually any color, the one pictured is a bright Coral

It is about 6" wide at the middle, and can adjust from 18" to 21" , which allows it to fit anyone. It is super comfortable, soft and you will not know that you even have it on.

Because the sizing is adjustable it should fit over curls, straight, long or short hair and dreads.

Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry.

I created this headband as a fashionable alternative to a typical headband, it is easy to wear, lightweight, absorbent and flattering to everyone.

If you love this style but prefer it in a different color or fiber, just convo me and I will be happy to work one up for you.

Colors are subject to monitor differences

name: Hand Painted Head Band, Op Art, OOAK, Hearts, Girly, Hair Trends
description:
Womens Head Band hand painted in the Op Art style with acrylic paints on upcycled tee shirts that have been bleached, and hand wrapped on a 2" wide rigid head band. 

Each Head band is made using recycled, re-purposed materials. The painting is done freehand with a combination of acrylic paints, gloss, gesso, ultra fine metallic powders and micro glitter. 

Each headband is lined with silk felt, these bands are very comfortable, with no pinching or tightness

You can order the style of band, but no two pieces will ever be exactly the same. 

Please allow 1 week for creating, and 3 - 5 business days for shipping. Each piece is custom made to your order.

name: Friendship Bracelets, Upcycled, Boho, Gypsy, Hand Painted
description:
Friendship Bracelet, Set of 4, Women"s hand painted, hand wrapped and finished bracelet. Tropical inspired colors, color blocking technique. Each piece is OOAK, you will receive the four bracelets that you see pictured

The materials are re-cycled, re-purposed from bleached cotton tees and organic cotton fleece

This is a 1" wide bracelet, please specify length when ordering

Each piece is handwrapped with fabric, hand painted with acrylic paints, glossed with ultra fine glitter powders and glaze. The inside is lined with silk felt that has been hand cut to fit.

These bracelets are finished with a lobster claw clasp, tassel, beads and charms

No two pieces will ever be the same, the pattern, colors and techniques will be the same, but each headband is painted and drawn individually.

Please allow for color differences based on your computer monitor
